trans-unit.source: Represents a container that holds the contents of a templated menu item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
The MenuItemTemplateContainer class is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control as a container for the contents of the menu items that are rendered using a custom template.
> [!NOTE] > This class is used by control developers primarily when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class to create a container for a templated menu item.

You can define a custom template for the dynamic and static menu items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicItemTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticItemTemplate%2A> properties, respectively.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the MenuItemTemplateContainer class, see the MenuItemTemplateContainer constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemTemplateContainer"></xref> class using the specified menu item index and menu item.
Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemTemplateContainer> class using the specified menu item index and menu item.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemTemplateContainer> class.

|Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemTemplateContainer.DataItem%2A>|The value of the `dataItem` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemTemplateContainer.ItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `itemIndex` parameter.|
The index of the menu item.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object associated with the container.
Gets or sets the menu item associated with the container.
Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the menu item associated with the container.
> [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item associated with the container.
Gets the index of the menu item associated with the container.
Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the menu item associated with the container.
> [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
The index of the menu item associated with the container.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets the menu item associated with the container.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object that represents the menu item associated with the container.
Gets the index value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object associated with the container.
The index value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object associated with the container.
Gets the index value of the menu item for the container.
The index value of the menu item for the container.
